title: Top Lesbian Sex Tips, Tricks & Techniques
description: There's a lot wrapped up in lesbian sexual experience. Whether it's your first time, or you have been a lesbian for a while, having sex with another woman is an amazing experience, even if you are not gay. This book provides a variety of tips, tricks, and interesting new things to try with your female lover. The secrets to great lesbian sex are portrayed in this book in a graphic, but easy to understand way. This is a must-read book for every woman interested in experiencing sex with another woman, first-time or "mature" lesbians, and young women in general who are interested in the subject.
author: Becky Moore
